report.title: Locations list
report.description: A general purpose list of locations.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt ON ctt.id=l.location_type_id AND ctt.term='Cetacean survey route' LEFT JOIN samples s on s.location_id=l.id #joins# WHERE l.deleted=false AND #website_filter#

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include
